participant_1.name: Alexandra
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, loves to explore unique ideas and express herself through art.
participant_1.background: I'd love to have lunch with George Lucas and talk about the powers of crystals in Star Wars. My dolls help me cope with the stress of my job. its good to eat a lot of veggies. I like musicians who are open about their sexuality and gender identity, because it gives me hope that I can be myself one day. I started my own photography business from home so I could listen to my music while working.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Determined and thoughtful, values education and personal growth, with a passion for creativity.
participant_2.background: I've been single my whole life, but I'm hoping to find someone special one day. I am proud of my discipline and commitment to my education, despite my sweet tooth. I am not a fashion diva, but I like to take care of my appearance. i am a professional horse racing handicapper. I spent my last birthday working on a new project for my YouTube channel.

content.text: Hey, I'm a big fan of Star Wars.
Me too! I was just reading about how the crystals in Star Wars are used to channel the Force.
I'd love to have lunch with George Lucas and talk to him about it.
That would be amazing! I'm sure he'd have a lot of interesting insights to share.
I also like to listen to music while I work.
Same here! I can't imagine working without music.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially like music by artists who are open about their sexuality and gender identity.
Me too! It gives me hope that I can be myself one day.
I'm glad to hear that. I think it's important to be yourself, no matter what.
I'm trying to be more open about myself, but it's hard.
I know it can be tough, but it's worth it.
